verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: introduced] [ARG1: his son Donald Trump Jr.] [ARG2: to his future wife , Vanessa] — but the ex - model did not take kindly to the introduction at the time .
President Donald Trump introduced his son Donald Trump Jr. to his future wife , Vanessa — but the ex - model [V: did] not take kindly to the introduction at the time .
